alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 15 at 3:30PM CDT until May 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated the heavy rain has ended across the warned area. Radar estimates between 1 and 3 inches of rain fell across the western and southern portion of Madison county and far eastern Washington county. Flash flooding may still be ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. Some locations that may experience flooding include... Huntsville... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wesley... Kingston... Forum... Aurora... Clifty... Boston... Withrow Springs State Park... Pettigrew... Japton... Witter... Marble... Goshen... Georgetown... Red Star... Alabam... Crosses... Best... FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
